zh: 汤姆说他以为我死了。

en: Tom thought it might be a trap.
zh: 汤姆觉得这可能是一个陷阱。

en: Again, Tom has gone and gotten mad at me.
zh: 汤姆又生气了，冲我来的。

en: I think we're lost.
zh: 我觉得我们迷路了。

en: I think I'm in danger.
zh: 我觉得我很危险。

en: I think Tom's an idiot.
zh: 我觉得汤姆是个白痴。

en: I think Tom is hardworking.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很努力工作。

en: I think Tom is insensitive.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很不敏感。

en: I think Tom is open-minded.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很思想开放。

en: I think Tom is pessimistic.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很悲观。

en: I think Tom is sympathetic.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很有同情心。

en: I think Tom is good-looking.
zh: 我觉得汤姆长得很好看。

en: I think Tom is hard-working.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很努力工作。

en: I think Tom is self-centered.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很以自我为中心。

en: What do you think so far?
zh: 到目前为止，你觉得怎么样？

en: Tom thinks I'm still a kid.
zh: 汤姆认为我还是个孩子。

en: Does Tom think he can do it?
zh: 汤姆认为他能做到吗？

en: I think Tom is narrow-minded.
zh: 我觉得汤姆很心胸狭隘。

en: I think Tom is untrustworthy.
zh: 我觉得汤姆不可靠。

en: Do you think you can handle it?
zh: 你觉得你能应付得了吗？

en: Tom is smarter than Mary thinks.
zh: 汤姆比玛丽想的要聪明。

en: What did you think of that book?
zh: 你觉得那本书怎么样？

en: Ask Tom what he thinks of Boston.
zh: 问问汤姆觉得波士顿怎么样。

en: I think Tom is a bit too impatient.
zh: 我觉得汤姆有点太急躁了。

en: The teacher thought I was cheating.
zh: 老师以为我作弊了。

en: You don't think Tom did it, do you?
zh: 你不认为汤姆做了这件事，是吗？

en: Do you really think I look like Tom?
zh: 你真的觉得我长得像汤姆吗？

en: Do you think it was Tom who did that?
zh: 你认为那是汤姆做的吗？

en: Tom is much younger than Mary thinks.
zh: 汤姆比玛丽想的要年轻得多。

en: Do you really think Tom would help us?
zh: 你真的认为汤姆会帮助我们吗？

en: I think I know where Tom put his keys.
zh: 我想我知道汤姆把钥匙放在哪里了。

en: Do you think you can handle this problem?
zh: 你觉得你能处理这个问题吗？

en: Tom thinks Mary doesn't get enough sleep.
zh: 汤姆认为玛丽睡眠不足。

en: Why do you think it was Tom who did that?
zh: 你为什么认为那是汤姆做的？

en: Where do you think Tom bought his motorcycle?
zh: 你认为汤姆在哪里买了他的摩托车？

en: Do you think Tom wants to go to Boston with us?
zh: 你认为汤姆想和我们一起去波士顿吗？

en: Tom isn't as good at French as you think he is.
zh: 汤姆的法语没有你想象的那么好。

en: Stay out of it.
zh: 别管这件事。

en: Can I stay here?
zh: 我能待在这里吗？

en: Stay away from it.
zh: 离它远点。

en: Stay away from us.
zh: 离我们远点。

en: Stay close to Tom.
zh: 靠近汤姆。

en: Stay in this room.
zh: 待在这个房间里。

en: Stay with me here.
zh: 和我待在这里。

en: You two stay here.
zh: 你们两个待在这里。

en: Unbeknownst to Tom, Mary was having it off with the milkman.
zh: 汤姆不知道的是，玛丽正和送奶工鬼混。

en: The way I see it, as larges cities, Tokyo and Osaka are essentially the same.
zh: 依我看来，东京和大阪作为大城市，本质上是相同的。

en: This is the first time I've seen a strawberry this huge.
zh: 这是我第一次见到这么大的草莓。

en: My dog is big.
zh: 我的狗很大。

en: Have more confidence in yourself.
zh: 对自己更有信心。

en: I want to live in Brazil.
zh: 我想住在巴西。

en: Do you hate me?
zh: 你讨厌我吗？

en: I want to eat soft serve ice cream.
zh: 我想吃甜筒冰淇淋。

en: That isn't a literal translation, it's just plain wrong.
zh: 那不是字面翻译，根本就是错的。

en: This house isn't new.
zh: 这房子不是新的。

en: This is a bad sign.
zh: 这是一个不好的兆头。

en: Don't bother getting annoyed over something like that.
zh: 别为那样的事情烦恼。

en: Your replies have been slow lately. Have you been busy?
zh: 你最近回复得很慢。你一直很忙吗？

en: I forgot I was in Australia.
zh: 我忘了我在澳大利亚。

en: Go ahead and say so if it hurts.
zh: 如果疼就说出来。

en: Your seal or signature here, please.
zh: 请在这里盖章或签名。

en: Sorry for bad-mouthing you the other time.
zh: 上次说了你的坏话，对不起。

en: "Tom, you look kind of green." "Do I?" "Is something wrong?" "There's nothing wrong."
zh: “汤姆，你看上去脸色不太好。”“是吗？”“有什么不对劲吗？”“没什么不对劲。”

en: I'll tell you the truth if you promise not to get mad.
zh: 如果你答应不生气，我就告诉你真相。

en: Thanks for hearing me out despite being so busy with work.
zh: 感谢你在工作这么忙的情况下听我倾诉。

en: I talk to myself a lot, but there's no need to worry.
zh: 我经常自言自语，但没必要担心。

en: I wish I had a cute little brother or a cool older brother.
zh: 我真希望有个可爱的弟弟或者酷酷的哥哥。

en: Looks like bringing gloves along was a good idea.
zh: 看来带着手套是个好主意。

en: Looks like work's been tough. Be sure to take care of yourself.
zh: 看来工作很辛苦。一定要照顾好自己。

en: I know everything about Tom. We've been together ever since elementary school.
zh: 关于汤姆的事我都知道。我们从小学开始就在一起了。

en: I'm from China.
zh: 我来自中国。

en: Next time, ask me before you use my car.
zh: 下次用我的车之前，先问问我。

en: What do you use this for?
zh: 这个是用来做什么的？

en: How was lunch?
zh: 午饭怎么样？

en: I never ever want to see you again.
zh: 我再也不想见到你了。

en: I get the feeling this will be a good day.
zh: 我感觉今天会是美好的一天。

en: "You aren't buying anything?" "Yeah, I've already eaten."
zh: “你不买东西吗？” “嗯，我已经吃过了。”

en: It's been a really long day, huh.
zh: 真是漫长的一天啊。

en: "Your speech was great." "Really? Thanks!"
zh: “你的演讲很棒。” “真的吗？谢谢！”

en: "I'm sorry, Tom." "Why are you apologizing?" "I was just thinking that I might be bothering you." "No, you aren't bothering me at all."
zh: “对不起，汤姆。” “你为什么要道歉？” “我只是觉得我可能在打扰你。” “不，你一点也没有打扰我。”

en: "Don't tell me you're already drunk." "I'm not, I'm not drunk."
zh: “别告诉我你已经喝醉了。” “我没有，我没醉。”

en: Tell Tom I'm sorry.
zh: 告诉汤姆我很抱歉。

en: It's too soon to tell.
zh: 现在说还为时过早。

en: That's what I was told.
zh: 我是听别人说的。

en: "Your full name, please." "Tom Miller."
zh: “请问你的全名。” “汤姆·米勒。”

en: Please give me your full name. "Tom Miller."
zh: 请告诉我你的全名。“汤姆·米勒。”

en: Please tell me what to do.
zh: 请告诉我该怎么做。

en: Ugh, the battery just had to die at the worst time.
zh: 哎，电池偏偏在最糟糕的时候没电了。

en: Tom told me where Mary lives.
zh: 汤姆告诉我玛丽住在哪里。

en: Has Tom told Mary what to do?
zh: 汤姆有没有告诉玛丽该怎么做？

en: You can tell Tom what you want.
zh: 你可以告诉汤姆你想要什么。

en: You didn't tell me Tom was busy.
zh: 你没告诉我汤姆很忙。

en: I told Tom he should study harder.
zh: 我告诉汤姆他应该更努力学习。

en: You should've told me that yesterday.
zh: 你昨天就应该告诉我这件事。

en: I'll do it if you tell me how to do it.
zh: 如果你告诉我怎么做，我就做。

en: You can't tell Tom what really happened.
zh: 你不能告诉汤姆真相。

en: Tell me who you gave your old toolbox to.
zh: 告诉我你把旧工具箱给了谁。

en: Someone has to tell Tom he should go on a diet.
zh: 必须有人告诉汤姆他应该节食。

en: The doctors told Tom that Mary would never recover.
zh: 医生告诉汤姆，玛丽永远不会康复。

en: She attacked the enemy.
zh: 她攻击了敌人。

en: Of course you understand.
zh: 你当然明白。

en: Even though we were also aiming for the championship this year.
zh: 即使我们今年的目标也是冠军。

en: For 5 days we will train like hell!
zh: 我们将像地狱一样训练5天！

en: A love letter from Gray?
zh: 格雷的情书？

en: Tom, have you already eaten lunch?
zh: 汤姆，你已经吃过午饭了吗？

en: Do you want to become internet friends?
zh: 你想成为网友吗？

en: It would be nice if the council recognized you as an official guild.
zh: 如果议会承认你为官方公会，那就太好了。

en: Every year, during the event, we sense a strange magical force.
zh: 每年，在活动期间，我们都会感觉到一种奇怪的魔法力量。

en: However, that magic power is evil and is similar to Zeref in a way.
zh: 然而，那种魔力是邪恶的，在某种程度上类似于杰尔夫。

en: My evolved Time Ark will increase your abilities.
zh: 我进化的时间方舟会增强你的能力。

en: Time Ark develops that container and makes it so that you will be able to use Second Origin.
zh: 时间方舟开发那个容器，使你能够使用第二起源。

en: If you did that it'd make me happy, but there's also the Simon thing.
zh: 如果你那样做我会很高兴，但还有西蒙的事。

en: If you wish to kill Simon's enemy, I'm prepared to throw away my life.
zh: 如果你想杀死西蒙的敌人，我准备放弃我的生命。

en: They can not drive a car.
zh: 他们不会开车。

en: Swedish is easy.
zh: 瑞典语很简单。

en: What do you think you'll score on tomorrow's test?
zh: 你觉得你明天的考试能考多少分？

en: What do you think you'll get on tomorrow's test?
zh: 你觉得你明天的考试会考多少分？

en: School was fun today.
zh: 今天上学很有趣。

en: I had fun at school today.
zh: 我今天在学校玩得很开心。

en: I want a boat.
zh: 我想要一艘船。

en: I also had my doubts about that.
zh: 我也对那件事有所怀疑。

en: Is it fine if I explain in English? Anyone who wouldn't be comfortable with English, please raise your hand.
zh: 我可以用英语解释吗？ 如果有人觉得用英语不舒服，请举手。

en: Explaining the risks is very important.
zh: 解释风险非常重要。

en: Jørgen is learning Greek.
zh: 约根正在学习希腊语。

en: No language is as lovely as Japanese.
zh: 没有一种语言像日语一样可爱。

en: What made you think that you would study French?
zh: 是什么让你认为你会学习法语？

en: I can read.
zh: 我会阅读。

en: I am Turkish.
zh: 我是土耳其人。

en: You are a Canadian.
zh: 你是加拿大人。

en: I am not an American. I am a Canadian.
zh: 我不是美国人。我是加拿大人。

en: I am Spanish.
zh: 我是西班牙人。

en: I am not French.
zh: 我不是法国人。

en: I am German.
zh: 我是德国人。

en: I am not Melissa.
zh: 我不是梅丽莎。

en: I am English.
zh: 我是英国人。

en: I am a banker.
zh: 我是一名银行家。

en: I'm a bank employee.
zh: 我是一名银行职员。

en: I'm a banker.
zh: 我是一名银行家。

en: I speak Korean.
zh: 我说韩语。

en: Emily is not a student.
zh: 艾米丽不是学生。

en: What did you write?
zh: 你写了什么？

en: You heard your father.
zh: 你听见你父亲说的话了。

en: You don't know the truth.
zh: 你不知道真相。

en: The island was completely deserted.
zh: 这个岛完全是荒无人烟的。

en: You can sit here.
zh: 你可以坐在这里。

en: I know that Tom can be blunt, but the more hurtful one seems to be Mary, doesn't it?
zh: 我知道汤姆说话可能很直率，但似乎更伤人的是玛丽，不是吗？

en: Maybe it's best not to add pepper.
zh: 也许最好不要加胡椒。

en: I don't think you need to worry so much; you'll be fine.
zh: 我觉得你不需要这么担心，你会没事的。

en: Sorry for not contacting you recently.
zh: 很抱歉最近没有联系你。

en: I think that as long as you worry about profit and loss, it can't be called love.
zh: 我认为只要你还在考虑盈亏，那就不能称之为爱。

en: As long as you are thinking about the pros and cons of a relationship, I don't think you can call it love.
zh: 只要你还在考虑一段关系的利弊，我认为你就不能称之为爱。

en: Sorry for always dumping you with all the housework. Thank you.
zh: 对不起，总是把所有的家务都丢给你。谢谢你。

en: I'm not in a homework-finishing mood.
zh: 我没有心情写作业。

en: This is reality.
zh: 这就是现实。

en: There are students in the library.
zh: 图书馆里有学生。

en: This is not mine.
zh: 这不是我的。

en: You don't need to apologize, Tom. I fell in love with you all on my own.
zh: 你不需要道歉，汤姆。我爱上你完全是我自己的选择。

en: Recently, no matter how much I sleep, it never seems to be enough.
zh: 最近，无论我睡多久，似乎都睡不够。

en: Television and newspapers play complementary roles.
zh: 电视和报纸起着互补的作用。

en: Tom is back with his ex-wife.
zh: 汤姆和他的前妻复合了。

en: After coming to Australia, I’ve become aware of many things that are different than in Japan.
zh: 来到澳大利亚后，我意识到很多事情和日本不一样。

en: The land was divided into 8 lots.
zh: 这块土地被分成了八块。

en: Because of my lack of sleep I'm going to bed early tonight.
zh: 因为我睡眠不足，今晚我要早点睡觉。

en: I'm Ricardo.
zh: 我是里卡多。

en: I am Ricardo.
zh: 我是里卡多。

en: I forgot my telephone number.
zh: 我忘记了我的电话号码。

en: You should follow Tom's example.
zh: 你应该以汤姆为榜样。

en: I have a lot of things I have to do before tomorrow.
zh: 明天之前我有很多事情要做。

en: There are a lot of things I have to do before tomorrow.
zh: 明天之前我有很多事情要做。

en: What use does economics have?
zh: 经济学有什么用？

en: It is no concern of our firm.
zh: 这不关我们公司的事。

en: Mr Smith is a softly-spoken person.
zh: 史密斯先生说话轻声细语。

en: The river meanders across the plain.
zh: 这条河蜿蜒流过平原。

en: I want to eat something sweet.
zh: 我想吃点甜的东西。

en: I want to go see a movie.
zh: 我想去看电影。

en: I'd like to go see a movie.
zh: 我想去看电影。

en: I want to go to the movies.
zh: 我想去看电影。

en: Should I drive on the way back?
zh: 我回去的时候要开车吗？

en: Today you can eat as much as you want.
zh: 今天你可以随便吃。

en: There's a safe somewhere in Tom's house.
zh: 汤姆家里的某个地方有个保险箱。

en: "Don't yah think this bag's cute" "Yea, it's so cute."
zh: “你不觉得这个包很可爱吗？” “是啊，太可爱了。”

en: You're the only one who can help us.
zh: 只有你能帮助我们。

en: Be careful not to trip and fall.
zh: 小心别绊倒。

en: Don't forget your student ID.
zh: 别忘了带学生证。

en: It's gotten cold. Be careful you don't catch a cold.
zh: 天气变冷了。小心别感冒。

en: Don't overdo it and wear yourself out, now.
zh: 别太勉强自己，累坏了。

en: I know things are crazy at work right now, but don't let it ruin your health.
zh: 我知道现在工作很忙，但别让它毁了你的健康。

en: Oh no, I didn't do my homework.
zh: 糟糕，我没做作业。

en: Aren't you guys sleepy?
zh: 你们不困吗？

en: Is there some reason you're saving these old bottles?
zh: 你留着这些旧瓶子有什么原因吗？

en: There's no way Tom can save up enough money in one year to buy a house.
zh: 汤姆不可能在一年内攒够钱买房子。

en: He was devoured by a tiger.
zh: 他被老虎吞噬了。

en: He got eaten by a tiger.
zh: 他被老虎吃了。

en: Tom is quick to turn violent.
zh: 汤姆动不动就发火。

en: "I'll come again." "Yeah, I look forward to it."
zh: “我会再来的。”“好啊，我期待着。”

en: Today there isn't a cloud in the sky, what a blue sky!
zh: 今天万里无云，真是个蓝天啊！

en: Feed me, please.
zh: 喂我，拜托了。

en: One ticket costs five hundred yen.
zh: 一张票要五百日元。

en: Where does that Tom person live?
zh: 那个叫汤姆的人住在哪里？

en: Do Japanese people eat sushi every day?
zh: 日本人每天都吃寿司吗？

en: I like people who use language beautifully.
zh: 我喜欢那些能漂亮地运用语言的人。

en: Have you grown to despise me?
zh: 你已经开始厌恶我了吗？

en: Taking the opportunity for President Obama to visit Japan as a state guest, the chief trade negotiators of Japan and the U.S. conducted a series of marathon meetings from midnight to early morning.
zh: 借着奥巴马总统作为国宾访问日本的机会，日美首席贸易谈判代表从午夜到清晨进行了一系列马拉松式会谈。

en: Most press reported the negotiations failed to produce an agreement although major progress was made, as time ran out.
zh: 大多数媒体报道称，谈判未能达成协议，尽管取得了重大进展，但时间不够了。

en: Meanwhile, one national newspaper put out a headline in its evening edition, which read Japan and the U.S. came to a substantial agreement. This surprised many people including the government officials.
zh: 与此同时，一家全国性报纸在其晚报上刊登了一个标题，内容是日美达成了实质性协议。这让包括政府官员在内的许多人感到惊讶。

en: Tom's wasting time.
zh: 汤姆在浪费时间。

en: I should've kept my mouth shut.
zh: 我真应该闭嘴。

en: Tom died three months before he was set to graduate.
zh: 汤姆在即将毕业的三个月前去世了。

en: "You going to Tom's party?" "I don't know yet."
zh: “你去参加汤姆的派对吗？”“我还不确定。”

en: I don't think there's anyone who hates Tom.
zh: 我觉得没有人讨厌汤姆。

en: I don't think that there's anybody who hates Tom.
zh: 我觉得没有人讨厌汤姆。

en: I don't think that there's anyone who hates Tom.
zh: 我觉得没有人讨厌汤姆。

en: I don't think there's anybody who hates Tom.
zh: 我觉得没有人讨厌汤姆。

en: Tom couldn't talk to Mary and there was nothing he could do about it.
zh: 汤姆无法和玛丽交谈，对此他无能为力。

en: You don't need my permission.
zh: 你不需要我的允许。

en: This is a difficult question.
zh: 这是一个很难的问题。

en: This is a picture of my drawing.
zh: 这是我画的画。

en: Some things are better left unsaid.
zh: 有些事还是不说为妙。

en: How is that pronounced?
zh: 这个怎么发音？

en: How was Tom's party?
zh: 汤姆的派对怎么样？

en: I can't sell you that.
zh: 我不能卖给你那个。

en: Did you put on sunscreen?
zh: 你涂防晒霜了吗？

en: Have you put on sunscreen?
zh: 你涂防晒霜了吗？

en: Ah, I forgot to apply sunscreen.
zh: 啊，我忘了涂防晒霜了。

en: Even after I get a job, I think I'll still want to continue some form of music.
zh: 即使我找到工作，我想我还是会想继续某种形式的音乐。

en: During the Sochi Olympics, the theme song by Kobukuro was a big hit. I'm sure everyone has heard it. However, it has already been three months. We do not hear the song anymore, do we?

en: Most of its life wolverine spends alone, really defending the borders of its territory from the individuals of the same sex.
zh: 狼獾一生中的大部分时间都是独自度过的，真正地捍卫着它的领土边界，以防同性个体入侵。

en: Wolverine makes its lair under torn out roots, in rock crevices and other secluded spots.
zh: 狼獾在被撕裂的树根下、岩石缝隙和其他隐蔽的地方筑巢。

en: It goes to feed at dusk.
zh: 它黄昏时去觅食。

en: Unlike most of mustelids who lead a settled lifestyle, wolverines constantly wander in search of prey on their individual plots of land occupying up to 1500-2000 square kilometers.
zh: 与大多数过着定居生活的鼬科动物不同，狼獾不断地在它们各自的土地上游荡，寻找猎物，占据面积高达1500-2000平方公里。

en: Thanks to strong paws and long claws wolverine can easily climb the trees.
zh: 由于强壮的爪子和长长的爪子，狼獾可以轻松地爬树。

en: It has keen eyesight, good ear and acute sense of smell.
zh: 它有敏锐的视力、良好的听力和灵敏的嗅觉。

en: It makes sounds similar to fox yapping.
zh: 它发出的声音类似于狐狸的叫声。

en: Wolverine is omnivorous.
zh: 狼獾是杂食动物。

en: It often eats remains of preys of wolves and bears.
zh: 它经常吃狼和熊的猎物残骸。

en: Wolverine catches a lot of hares and black grouses, hazel grouses, small rodents.
zh: 狼獾会捕获大量的野兔、黑琴鸡、榛鸡和小啮齿动物。

en: Rarely preys on large ungulates.
zh: 很少捕食大型有蹄类动物。

en: If this is the case, its victims are usually young calves, injured or sick animals.
zh: 如果是这种情况，它的受害者通常是幼小的幼崽、受伤或生病的动物。

en: Can take by force other predators’ (wolves, lynx) prey.
zh: 可以强行夺取其他掠食者（狼、猞猁）的猎物。

en: Often ravages hunters' cabins and steals prey from traps.
zh: 经常破坏猎人的小屋，并从陷阱中偷走猎物。

en: There are evidences that at times large wolverines attack wolves.
zh: 有证据表明，有时大型狼獾会攻击狼。

en: In summer it eats birds' eggs, wasps' larvae, berries and honey.
zh: 夏天，它吃鸟蛋、黄蜂的幼虫、浆果和蜂蜜。

en: It catches fish in ice-holes or during spawning time and readily picks up dead fish.
zh: 它在冰窟窿里或产卵期捕鱼，并欣然捡起死鱼。

en: Hunts birds, catching them on the ground when they are sleeping or sitting on nests.
zh: 捕猎鸟类，在鸟类睡觉或坐在巢里时在地上捕捉它们。

en: Wolverines make up nature's clean-up crew, killing weak and sick animals.
zh: 狼獾构成了大自然的清洁队，杀死虚弱和生病的动物。

en: Wolverine climbs trees no worse than moves on the ground.
zh: 狼獾爬树不比在地上行走差。

en: Wolverine can kill a prey that is 5 times the size of it, but only in rather deep snow where large animals get stuck.
zh: 狼獾可以杀死比自己大5倍的猎物，但只能在大型动物被困住的相当深的雪地里。

en: Can attack a human if cornered.
zh: 如果被逼到绝境，可能会攻击人类。

en: Since wolverine is a very evil wild beast, even a bear in the case of encountering a wolverine tries to avoid it.
zh: 由于狼獾是一种非常凶猛的野兽，即使是熊在遇到狼獾的情况下也会尽量避开它。

en: Me, I hate people who are indiscriminately friendly.
zh: 我讨厌那些不分青红皂白对人友好的人。

en: I think everything happens for a reason.
